long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
inContext is a novel AI dictionary that creates unique, context-informed definitions tailored to your language level.

Learning a new language has never been more convenient: highlight an unfamiliar word, and inContext will instantly present you with a personalized definition, right within your Chrome browser.

All your definitions are saved and accessible in the side panel for later review.

Features:

1. Seamlessly integrated into your reading experience: highlight any word on any page, and inContext will show you the definition.

2. Context-driven: Words have various definitions and subtleties based on their context. inContext will always check the context of the word to provide an accurate and more understandable definition.

3. Personalized: inContext will tailor definitions to your language level, using an appropriate vocabulary. This means that you'll never need to look up more words that you don't know in the definition.

4. Reviewable: inContext keeps a record of the words you looked up and the context in which they were encountered so that you can review them to transform them into language knowledge.

5. Based on science and experience: the team behind inContext is deep in language acquisition and is building the product they want to use for language learning.
